LanguageData.NAT_SerpentAssault.label: serpent assault
LanguageData.NAT_SerpentAssault.letterText:
A swarm of huge gape-mawed monsters are attacking!
These creatures' jaws are massive enough to swallow a human whole. Keep your distance!
